channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1481; 06:15PM; EB 210 Fwy x Maclay St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q8R7rK; #Sylmar; It took just 18 minutes for crews from LAFD and ANF to extinguish a half-acre brush fire near the Maclay on ramp to the 210 freeway. No reported injuries. Cause was unable to be determined.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 CW3A E18 E275 E287 E298 E7 E8 E87 E90 E91 EM15 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA81 T75 T87 T98 WT77; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1481; 05:57PM; EB 210 Fwy x Maclay St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q8R7rK; #Sylmar; Half-acre brush fire near the freeway. No structures threatened.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E298 E7 E8 E87 E90 E91 EM15 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA81 T75 T87 T98; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1145; 03:46PM; 3050 N Lake Hollywood Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PrPpy1; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters responded to a two-vehicle traffic collision, which appears to have caused the initial brush fire. Firefighters extinguished the quarter-acre fire in medium brush, before locating another spot fire (50' x 50') approximately 100 yards away from the original fire. Crews transitioned to the second burn and surrounded that one, achieving extinguishment of both in a total of 53 minutes. One adult female was assessed for minor injuries due to the traffic collision, but did not need hospital transport.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC5 CW3A DZ45 E227 E260 E41 E76 E82 E86 E90 E97 EM5 H3 H4 H7 HA3 HA4 HA7 HE1 RA827 T27 T60; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1145; 02:53PM; 3050 N Lake Hollywood Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PrPpy1; #HollywoodHills; Two-vehicle traffic collision, with no auto fire. Approximately one-quarter acre of brush burning uphill, with a slow rate of spread.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC5 CW3A DZ45 E227 E260 E41 E76 E82 E86 E90 E97 EM5 H3 H4 H7 HA3 HA4 HA7 HE1 T27 T60; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0927; 01:31PM; 19041 W Saticoy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/484tzb4; #Reseda; *Corrected Address* Firefighters arrived to find several vehicles and several palm trees on fire. The flames damage a nearby shed and detached garage. Firefighters quickly deployed hose lines and defended nearby homes, keeping them from being damaged. Ultimately, it took 30 firefighters 25 minutes to eliminate the flames. There were no reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 CE83 CW3A E104 E273 E293 E296 E72 E73 E93 RA104 RA72 RA872 T73 T93 T96; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0927; 01:06PM; 7650 N Calvin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45GJHxy; #Reseda; Several palm trees and autos on fire, which spread to a nearby single-family home. Offensive mode.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 CW3A E104 E273 E293 E296 E72 E73 E93 RA104 RA872 T73 T93 T96; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 08/29/2023 INC#0686

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0686; 11:51AM; 2311 N Daly St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44uCEXI; #LincolnHeights; *Corrected Address* Firefighters found a 100-ft x 100-ft one-story commercial building on fire. Crews made entry with hose lines, and extinguished the first-floor fire. Crews then discovered a mezzanine inside, which contained additional fire above. Ultimately, it took 88 firefighters 57 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames (additional companies have been added for workload relief during overhaul operations). We want to thank the volunteers from our LAFD CERT program who responded to assist with hydration and rehab, to support firefighters as they work during this heatwave. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CE83 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E16 E2 E201 E202 E203 E212 E215 E250 E3 E4 E44 E47 E55 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM5 HR3 RA12 RA2 RA47 RA56 RA801 RA803 RA844 SO1 SQ21 T1 T12 T15 T2 T3 T50 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0686; 10:54AM; 2426 E Manitou Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45sVOhX; #LincolnHeights; Large one-story commercial with fire showing .; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E10 E16 E2 E201 E202 E203 E212 E250 E3 E44 E55 EM1 HR3 RA12 RA2 RA801 RA803 RA844 SQ21 T1 T12 T2 T3 T50 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1352; 06:40PM; 4266 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EbCTw2; #VermontSquare; LAFD firefighters coordinated their efforts to carefully protect items in the fourplex, before opening up the ceiling and roof to access fire in the attic with hose lines. Ultimately, it took 30 firefighters 22 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E215 E233 E33 E46 E66 RA15 RA46 RA846 SQ21 T15 T33; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1352; 06:18PM; 4266 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EbCTw2; #VermontSquare; Two-story four-plex with moderate smoke showing from the roof (suspected attic fire). Crews will begin salvage operations to protect belongings below, before deploying hose lines in the attic and ventilating the roof. Offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E215 E46 E66 RA46 RA846 T15; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange
